meta.name: viewport
meta.title: Welcome to PAWS - Pet Animal Welfare Society, New Delhi, India

div.p: The PAWS team feeds, treats and sterilizes homeless animals before releasing them in their territories, but all this needs funds, emotions apart!
The PAWS team feeds, treats and sterilizes homeless animals before releasing them in their territories, but all this needs funds, emotions apart!
The PAWS team feed, treat, foster and sterilize homeless dogs and Cats before releasing them in their respective territories. All this needs funds, emotions apart.

div.h6: how together we can make a difference
div.h3: PAWS HAS HELPED AND SAVED LIVES OF THOUSANDS OF HOMELESS ANIMALS AND NOW WE NEED YOUR HELP TO CONTINUE THIS.

div.p: There are so many takers for pedigree dogs. But our Desi Indian breed look upto you.. Make a difference!
As a volunteer at our shelter, you may offer a variety of support like providing foster care for puppies till adopted!
All donations are exempted from Income Tax under 80G. We also accept Foreign funds under FCRA act 1976.

div.h3: PAST & RECENT MOST EVENTS AT PAWS

iframe.allow: accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture

div.h6: PAWS Day with a Homeless Animal

iframe.allow: accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture
accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture

div.h6: PAWS for A Cause Adoption Camp

div.p: Certificates will be provided on the basis of hours contributed for the cause.

div.h3: EACH HOMELESS ANIMAL HAS A STORY TO TELL....

h5.a: SNOWY RADHA GOT HER HOME AND THE BEST LOVING PARENTS
TIGER & BRUNO HAVE SAID BYE TO THEIR DISABILITIES
PAWS HAD FOUND HIM SEVERELY STARVED FOR DAYS
ALOO & KALU WERE RESCUED ON THAT RAINY DAY...!!

div.h3: HELP THOUSANDS OF HOMELESS AND SICK OR INJURED HOMELESS ANIMALS TO HEAL AND FIND HAPPY HOMES

div.p: The sight of diseased animals and accidental cases is heart rending for those who love animals. It also takes a lot of strength and determination to nurse them back to health and that is precisely what is all about the PAWS long-term project. Get involved - pawsitively!!!
Your messages will keep PAWS energized
To become India's most blessed organization for pet welfare and complete and dedicated care center for animals in distress.

br.p:
An Association with RSPCA International
Recognized by Animal Welfare Board of India,
Animal Husbandry Department,
Municipal Corporation of Delhi

br.br:
A/c Name: PET ANIMAL WELFARE SOCIETY
